description: A shell script for monitoring and managing the development server using Vite, including process cleanup, port management, and automatic restarts.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Cleans up Vite and npm processes upon exit or interruption.

methods.name: check_port
methods.description: Checks if a specific port is currently in use.

methods.name: find_available_port
methods.description: Finds an available port within a specified range, default 3000-3010.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function orchestrating the process management, port allocation, and server restart logic.
